import math

def main():
    a = int(input())
    print(int(math.sqrt(a)))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#!/usr/bin/env python3

import math

def main():
    a = int(input("Enter a number: "))
    print(int(math.sqrt(a))) #print the square root of the number

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()


a = int(input())
b = a//2+1
print(b)
